title.narrative: DON'T USE 601.03 PHC/ Integrated Management of Childhood Illness (IMCI) / MALARIA

description.narrative: By 2015, children and women have increased access to primary health care services that include integrated management of childhood illnesses (IMCI) services and malaria control and preventative services., which contributes to Child Health, Early Childhood Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children benefit from scaled up and sustained high impact child survival, maternal health and HIV/AIDS interventions with a focus on equity
